thread.title: W. (Bill) Kerkhoff

author: W. (Bill) Kerkhoff
title: W. (Bill) Kerkhoff
text: Good company to do business with, even when a problem with order. I ordered a hydronic towel warmer, which through some confusion on the website information caused the unit shipped and received to be the wrong size. Upon informing them, they immediately accepted responsibility, and advise me to repackage it in the original packaging material, and have it ready for their courier to pick it up, and I would received full credit. And advised me to order the correct unit, which I did and received by courier within 2 days from placing the order. I will certainly order from them again when the need arises.
